main.com.tec.MILIB_RAID.Resources

Class RAIDRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.com.tec.MILIB_RAID.Resources.RAIDRestService

  • public class RAIDRestService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements the Web Service for the MILIB project for the RAID This Web Service run on Port 9080

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response BACK()
      Make rollback of all changes made to the database url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/back
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response COMMIT()
      Make commit of all changes made to the database url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/commit
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response DELETE(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      Method responsible for removing an image from the disk given its metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/delete

      Method in charge of returning a JSON with the requested image from the client, under the criterion of the parameters of the metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/seek
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response WRITE(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
      It is responsible for inserting new images in the RAID and divide the image logically in each disk (directory file) url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/write

                                throws org.json.JSONException

      • SEEK

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response SEEK(java.io.InputStream incomingData)
                               throws org.json.JSONException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Method in charge of returning a JSON with the requested image from the client, under the criterion of the parameters of the metadata url: http://ip_addr:port/MILIB_RAID_war_exploded/api/raid/seek
        Parameters:
        incomingData - Receive a json with the information of the requested images
        Returns:
        Returns the requested image and metadata in JSON format
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.io.IOException
